creator.description:
Bluesky.ms is a community driven effort to connect with folks at Microsoft and also label accounts verified as 

✅ Microsoft employee
✅ Microsoft MVP & RD

This service is managed by @merill.net as a personal project and is not affiliated with Microsoft

locales.description:
Verified Microsoft MVP. 

The Microsoft Most Valuable Professionals (MVP) program recognizes exceptional community leaders for their technical expertise, leadership, speaking experience, online influence, and commitment to solving real world problems.

See aka.ms/mvp
locales.name: Microsoft MVP

locales.description:
Verified Microsoft Regional Director.

The Microsoft Regional Directors program recognizes industry professionals for their cross-platform technical expertise, community leadership, public speaking experience, online influence, and commitment to business results.

See aka.ms/mvp
locales.name: Microsoft RD

locales.description:
Verified Microsoft MVP and Microsoft Regional Director

The Microsoft Most Valuable Professionals (MVP) program recognizes exceptional community leaders for their technical expertise, leadership, speaking experience, online influence, and commitment to solving real world problems.

The Microsoft Regional Directors program recognizes industry professionals for their cross-platform technical expertise, community leadership, public speaking experience, online influence, and commitment to business results.

See aka.ms/mvp
locales.name: Microsoft MVP & RD
